name: Neorion Hotel

reviews.text: The Neorion manages to achieve excellence in all major categories. Rooms are modern, comfortable and come with many amenities; the location is near major tourist sites; one airport transport is free; a good buffet breakfast is included at no additional cost; free food is available all day until evening; and a spa-type area with small pool is accessible for free. Finally, but most importantly, the service provided by the staff is excellent. They are friendly, helpful and knowledgeable. This hotel has figured out how to make its guests happy, and is highly recommended.
reviews.title: Unusually Excellent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Neorion on two separate ocassions, a week apart - used it as our base in Istanbul. The service and staff are impeccable, cannot fault them on anything - free airport pick-up in both instances went smoothly and without a hitch. The rooms are very spacious and clean, the breakfast is ample, the facilities are fantatsic. Not a budget hotel by any means, but in my opinion very good value for the money. Location-wise it is optimally located in the historic part of town with quick and easy access to all the sites. Enjoyed our stay very much!
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Neorion Hotel was like comfort food for the weary body and soul - like coming home after a hard day and having your favorite meal. From check-in and the helpful orientation with Ceyda to our comfortable room and bed, there was an easy and relaxed vibe throughout the hotel. Ceyda and Sirin were the best and most friendly concierges we have ever had the pleasure to meet - always smiling, ready to help or make dinner reservations for us. The front desk staff were also helpful and professional. Then there were the little touches, like the towel elephant that our room attendant left on the bed to cheer us up after a long day of touring...need more pillows, or another blanket...no problem, they were delivered in minutes with a smile. We spent 4 nights there in a superior room on the 6th floor, and it was very quiet, the distant, muffled bells on the passing tram were comforting rather than annoying, and even had a view of the Blue Mosque from our room and balcony, which we were pleases to use one sunny afternoon looking over the rooftops or down at the street life below us. The location is excellent as others have said, perfectly placed to walk to sights in Sultanahmet or to the Spice Market and ferries on the Golden Horn. Do we have any complaints? Softer towels, perhaps, and maybe tea or coffee available in the lobby during the day, but it seems so petty when some much else was perfect. And the bananas and honey along with the rest of the very nice breakfast spread...they were the icing on the cake.
reviews.title: Bananas and Honey!

reviews.text: We stayed at the Neorion hotel for three nights. We were picked up by a helpful and cheerful driver of the hotel from the airport. The hotel is ideally located to explore grand Bazar, mosques and Palaces. The staff are most helpful, the rooms are clean, big and the beds are comfortable. The afternoon snacks are free and delicious. Undoubtably one of the best hotel we stayed in.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel and location

reviews.text: My cousin and I spent 3 nights at the Neorion at the end of March, as a result of reading the reviews on TripAdvisor. It fully justified the rave reviews it has been receiving. We were upgraded to a 6th floor room, with a balcony. Everything you could possibly ask for was supplied - we would just have liked a little more room to unpack, but otherwise it was wonderful. The toiletries in the bathroom were awesome and there was a list of extras you could ask for if you required them. The hotel is situated within easy walking distance of all the major sites and very close to the tram station, from where one could catch the tram to any one of the major destinations and also use it to go quickly and easily to Taksim Square and modern Istanbul. The staff were very helpful and even offered to get an Istanbulkart for the public transport for us if we had any problems. The spa area is very good indeed too. It was too cold to use the terrace while we were there, but we enjoyed the view from our balcony.
reviews.title: Wonderful visit
A lesson in hospitality
reviews.text: I must endorse what has been written by so many others before me. The staff at this hotel could give lessons to others in how to look after their guests!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our wonderful 12 day stay in the Neorion was unforgettable. Our bedroom was spacious and had a great view of the activity on the street below and we never found the noise intrusive. We had asked for a change of room which we got as we had a view of a nondescript yard to start with and we enjoyed looking at the shops and passersby more entertaining !
reviews.title: Wonderful hotel

reviews.text: All the helpfulness of the reception and concierge staff has been well covered by other guests. The delicious fruit, nuts and juice at breakfast along with the honeycomb gave a healthy start to the day and there were lovely egg, mushroom and cheese hot dishes for those who wanted them. So much variety and choice.
reviews.title: Best Hotel Experience I've Ever Had

reviews.text: The position of the Neorion makes it an ideal place to walk to the Blue Mosque, Aghio Sophia, Topkapi Palace, Archaeoligical Museum, Egyptian Spice Market, and Grand Bazaar to name but some. The tram is so convenient and easy to use for trips a bit further away. The ferries are easily accessed too.
reviews.title: Great hotle in Sultanahmet area

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had something different and wonderful to see every day of our holiday and I would be very happy to return to this haven of hospitality!
reviews.title: The Perfect Hotel

reviews.text: Everything about the hotel was great. What stood out the most was the friendliness of the staff. The members of the concierge team proactively helped, printed out schedules and information, patiently showed us where everything was on a map, and checked in with us throughout the trip.
reviews.title: Perfect service stood out

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfast and afternoon food provided were delicious and included freshly squeezed orange juice, homemade jams, many kinds fresh bread, fruits, cakes & cookies, and deliciously marinated vegetables.
reviews.title: Great place to stay

reviews.text: The pool, sauna and Hamam where clean and comfortable, and there were locker rooms that provided you with a key, slippers, a towel for the sauna, a towel for a shower, and a small towel/rug to stand on when changing.
reviews.title: Welcoming and excellent service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location is convenient for both sight-seeing and for exploring the rest of Istanbul, as it is just a couple minutes from the tram and ten minutes from the ferries that go all over Istanbul.
reviews.title: Good, but not perfect

reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about it, but what stood out more than anything else was the sincerely friendly and helpful service.
reviews.title: Highly recommended

reviews.text: In the beginning of April two friends and I visited Istanbul for three days. I "made my investigation" on TRIPADVISOR, as I always do, and decided to contact the NEORION Hotel after reading all the raving reviews. My first "taste" of the impeccable service of the NEORION was my contact with one of their reservation ladies, lovely Ceydan, with whom I spoke on the phone and exchanged e-mails several times, which made me look more forward to our visit every time! So today I would like to add one more review to all the positive things that have been written until now. Everything in the hotel was excellent. We all wished we could have stayed longer than the three nights. We felt we were guests at a friend's house from the moment that we were greeted on the door with freshly squeezed juices and the smiling faces of Cagdas and Ceyda to the minute we left for the airport to fly back home The night concierge, I think his name was Fatih, as well as EVERYBODY in the hotel were the most friendly, nice, efficient and smiling people I have met. The reason I am not mentioning ALL their names, is only because I would need to have paper and pen in my hand all the time! The breakfast buffet, the afternoon meze, the complimentary abundant non alcoholic juices etc were only a small sample of the lovely service. It is a small, clean, hospitable hotel with all the possible amenities, in a very nice and convenient location. They also have a hamam and spa with a VERY good masseur, Oktay, who does a wonderful job. I hope we will soon come back to this wonderful "home" for us, as it really feels like home, once you enter the establishment. We will be back for sure!
reviews.title: MEMORABLE STAY WITH LOVELY PEOPLE

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Selected The Neorion Hotel from Trip Advisor. My wife found it to be in a great location (old city). It was an easy walk to most landmarks but the Tram was 1 minute away if you're too tired at the end of the day. The rooms were a decent size, newly renovated and spotless. The food at the hotel was very good and and we have never been treated so well from start to finish by all the hotel staff. Would love to return!
reviews.title: Beats Expectations

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I chose this hotel because of its number one rating on Tripadvisor, and liked it, but did not find it rating five stars. The most important thing the hotel did for my husband and myself was to give us a temporary room when we arrived at 7AM. I find that extraordinary! The room and bath that we were moved to for three days were nice, and since they had no view whatsoever, were very quiet. The location in the old part of town near the tourist attractions was excellent, and its nearness to so many restaurants was convenient.
reviews.title: A nice well-located hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: From the moment we arrived, to the moment we left, the staff at this hotel made sure our stay was pleasurable and stress free. Nothing was too much trouble. We came across one of female hotel staff whilst out in the city and she actually took time to ask if we were okay, whether we were enjoying our time and if there was anything we needed help with. Totally unheard of. The room was clean and comfortable. The views from the roof terrace are superb and a great place to relax with a beer after a days sightseeing. Good choice of food at breakfast and afternoon meze was perfect to see you through to tea time. Very convenient for all the major tourist sites.
reviews.title: Clear to see why this is number 1

reviews.text: I've just spent 3 days in Istanbul, staying at the Neorion, based on the reviews on Trip Advisor!
reviews.title: The place to stay...

description: Neorion Hotel is at the very center of Istanbul's history and culture, ancient and modern. Named for Byzantium's grand port (see the map) on the Golden Horn, it welcomes visitors from around the world just as the port did in the great days of Constantinople. Neorion is more than a comfortable travelers' refuge in the heart of the city. It was conceived and designed to honor and reflect all of the cultures who have enriched the city and its empires. To stay here is to learn and enjoy the cultures, cuisines, arts and traditions of all the travelers who have come before you.The hotel's 58 guest rooms and suites bring the past to life, with all modern comforts. The swimming pool, Turkish bath, massage spa, cultural library, and museum-quality decorative arts are supplemented with complimentary fine arts musical performances, cuisine demonstrations and cultural events exclusively for hotel guests. Stay with us! Experience all of Istanbul, ancient and modern, right where you live, and just outside our door.
